posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

I wanted to finally start work on a t210 set and thought I'd give this one a try.  Looking for some examples to get me started.  Lowgrade condition is fine by me.  I've got some trade material listed as well as quite a few 1919 Zeenuts if anyone is interested in trading.  Thanks in advance,

Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com
